name: cascades
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large group of mountains in the US and Canada that runs through British Columbia, Washington, Oregon, and California: Loose volcanic rocks on the high slopes of the Cascades are especially prone to surge downhill in wet weather. In all, the pipeline would extend 210 miles, feeding into a natural gas network east of the Cascades.
More examplesFewer examples She's planning trail walks in the Cascades, a river rafting trip, and visits to see spawning salmon. As much as two feet of snow is expected to fall in the Cascades. Oregon has one of the largest elk herds in the nation and generally healthy mule deer east of the Cascades.
